column5: Anyone have current leech prices by the pound in Ontario this year? Leaving next week and not wanting any surprises. Fort Francis area?What about minnows and crawlers?Pooch
It will be almost free for you Pooch. Have a good trip. Going to Savant?
We just got back. Leeches were $ 24.99 per half pound and minnows were $ 5.50 a dozen by Sioux lookout. We are currently looking into cheaper alternatives. Good luck
Out of curiosity, did you buy both types of bait ? If so, who did you buy from and where?PjShorthorn.

We did. Leeches in Fort Francis. The bait shop on the way out of town on the left. Not sure on the name. The minnows we bought were at the gas station at the turn to Hudson. Seems like we get charged a different price each time we go there.

Hello Dakota Floyd my prices are the same as last year $42 a pound for leeches and $4 a dozen for minnows I am the owner/operator of Timber Edge Camps about 12 miles south of Sioux Lookout on Minnitaki 3 miles north of Donnely's by highway.
Timber Edge - Thank you for your post. I think that will help a lot of guys.
Rainy River Sports in Ft. Frances was $44.95 for a lb. Called to reserve and have some ready for our trip next week.
Timber edge. We will be up August 10th. Will you have leeches then? We would like a pound as well as minnows. Thanks

In Sioux Lookout a week ago, i paid $60 for a flat of crawlers. Slate Falls got them for me and was told i.got the last flat at that price-they were going up to. $66/flat apparently. Sent from my SM-G935V using Tapatalk
